resources.string: GoodWork is part of a broader idea of putting our work to good use. We want to push the notion that exercising while volunteering is just as good as working out at the gym. Come join our mission and we will unite our communities one muscle group at a time! To view our GitHub repository, click here here.
Front-end Development. Has a roommate with three eyed sunglasses.
Back-end Development. Also loves working out in the gym (should use our app more)
